languages.text: {n}Вам отвечает нестройный, но искренний хор голосов — пожеланий, благословений, напутствий и выражений почтения. На секунду вам становится особенно ясно — вероятно, вы больше никогда не увидите никого из этих людей.{/n}

{n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам отвечает нестройный, но искренний хор голосов — пожеланий, благословений, напутствий и выражений почтения. На секунду вам становится особенно ясно — вероятно, вы больше никогда не увидите никого из этих людей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you probably aren't going to see any of these people ever again.{/n}

{n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you probably aren't going to see any of these people ever again.{/n}

{n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

{n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}无数声音响了起来，向你表达祝愿、祝福、赠言与敬意。虽然这些声音吵吵嚷嚷，但却情真意切。在那一瞬间，你心中产生了极其清楚的预兆，你感觉以后恐怕再也见不到这些人了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无数声音响了起来，向你表达祝愿、祝福、赠言与敬意。虽然这些声音吵吵嚷嚷的，但却情真意切。在那一瞬间，你心中产生了极其清楚的感觉，你感觉你以后可能再也见不到这些人了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}沢山の声が、あなたに幸運の祈りを、祝福を、別れを告げ、敬意の言葉を掛けてくる―お互いの声に被せてだったが、どれも心からの言葉だった。そしてふと、おそらくこの人達とは二度と会うことはないのだろうと、あなたはハッキリと自覚した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沢山の声が、あなたに幸運の祈りを、祝福を、別れを告げ、敬意の言葉を掛けてくる―お互いの声に被せてだったが、どれも心からの言葉だった。そしてふと、おそらくこの人達とは二度と会うことはないのだろうと、あなたはハッキリと自覚した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una multitud de voces te responde deseándote buena suerte, bendiciéndote y dándote consejos, gritando unas más fuerte que otras, pero con la misma sinceridad. Sientes por un segundo con total claridad que no volverás a ver a ninguna de esas personas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una multitud de voces te responde deseándote buena suerte, bendiciéndote y dándote consejos, gritando unas más fuerte que otras, pero con la misma sinceridad. Sientes por un segundo que no volverás a ver a ninguna de esas personas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Vielzahl von Stimmen antwortet dir, wünscht dir Glück, segnet dich, gibt dir gute Ratschläge zum Abschied, bekundet ihren Respekt — alle reden durcheinander, aber alle sind vollkommen aufrichtig. Eine Sekunde lang hast du das ganz klare Gefühl, dass du wohl niemanden von diesen Leuten jemals wiedersehen wirst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Vielzahl von Stimmen antwortet dir, wünscht dir Glück, segnet dich, gibt dir gute Ratschläge zum Abschied, bekundet ihren Respekt — alle reden durcheinander, aber alle sind vollkommen aufrichtig. Eine Sekunde lang hast du das ganz klare Gefühl, dass du wohl niemanden von diesen Leuten jemals wiedersehen wirst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une cacophonie de voix vous noie sous des vœux de bonne fortune, des bénédictions, des conseils et des gages de respect. Bien que chacun essaie de parler plus fort que les autres, tous sont sincères. L'espace d'un instant, vous êtes comme {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que vous ne verrez plus jamais aucun d'entre eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une cacophonie de voix vous noie sous des vœux de bonne fortune, des bénédictions, des conseils et des gages de respect. Bien que chacun essaie de parler plus fort que les autres, tous sont sincères. L'espace d'un instant, vous êtes comme {mf|persuadé|persuadée} que vous ne verrez plus jamais aucun d'entre eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin; çok sayıda iyi şans dileği, kutsama, son nasihat ve saygı ifadesi ile karşılık buluyor. Bütün sesler birbirine girerken hepsi samimiyet barındırıyor. Bir anda, büyük ihtimalle bu insanların hiçbirini bir daha göremeyeceğini net bir şekilde hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A multitude of voices answers you with good luck wishes, blessings, parting advice, and words of respect — shouting over each other but alike in their sincerity. For a second, you feel especially clearly that you likely will not see any of these people ever again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözlerin, çok sayıda iyi şans dilekleri, kutsamalar, son nasihatler ve saygı ifadeleri ile karşılık buluyor. Bütün sesler birbirine giriyor ancak hepsi de içinde samimiyet barındırıyor. Bir anlığına çok net bir şekilde hissediyorsun ki, büyük ihtimalle bu insanların hiçbirini bir daha göremeyeceksin.{/n}
